title: Black olive vinaigrette
ingredients: ['5 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon white wine vinegar', '3-4 tablespoons water', '1 clove garlic, pressed through the garlic press', '4 sprigs parsley, finely chopped', '25g capers, drained and chopped', '25g black olives, pitted and chopped', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
